website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some concerns, this shampoo has earned a customer following for its ability to prevent color from fading too quickly. Often recommended by professional hairstylists.
pros: Protects color and strengthens hair by developing a protective barrier
Made with plant-based oils that nourish and moisturize
You don't need to use a lot to get rich lather
cons: May leave hair feeling a bit sticky
Scalp irritation and dandruff are some complaints from users
Some customers expected to receive a pump, but it doesn't come with one

customer_reviews.title: WHERE'S THE PUMP
customer_reviews.text: WHERE'S THE PUMP? I purchased this item from this reseller because this showed a PUMP. Apparently I'm not the only one with this problem. I knew I wanted this product so I didn't look at the comments prior to purchase. The product from the manufacturer is great but this only gets 1 star because it didn't come with a PUMP and that was the ONLY reason I purchased from this reseller. My hairdresser uses it and I had her order my first bottle, which came as a set with the conditioner, which I don't need to reorder yet - and thankfully have now found the shampoo at a good price on Amazon. product_meta.title: Joico K-PAK Color Therapy Shampoo 33.8 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Our brilliant restorative styling oil delivers all the high-powered punch of a professional conditioning treatment, with the shine-meisters that give color-treated hair a healthy-looking, lustrous finish.

BRAND_DESCRIPTION
A gentle color-protecting shampoo for weak or multi-processed hair. Provides a dense, cushiony lather that rinses away easily, helping to prevent tangles and protect hair fibers. This rich shampoo will significantly improve your color rentention, add shine and smoothness, and tame your flyaway hair.
